attributes.action: fix unjust taxation on England to subsidise free services in Scotland not offerd to England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scotland is given cash raised by English taxpayers to provide free services such as higher education and perscription drugs to Scotish residents.  This is not fair on English citizens.  Why should England be paying for Scotish benefits and independant government.

This petition asks that monies raised in England are used to improve English services, or better still less tax!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
